channel.title: Deleuze on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Deleuze on Joost Plattel

item.title: Rhizomatic notetaking
item.description:
The past few weeks I’ve been exploring the philosophy of Deleuze & Guattari in which I focus mostly on the rhizome. As the rhizome doesn’t have a start or end, grows from within itself and into multiple directions I saw similarities on how I started to take more notes recently.

I’ve been using my own Obsidian Clipper chrome extension to clip short amounts of text and those are automatically tagged with ðŸŒ±. Next I have a Obsidian Query Language block that’s set up to track the last few seedling notes that I’ve created:
